channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #189, including every tabletop rpg project started between 01/16 and 01/31
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #189, including every tabletop rpg project started between 01/16 and 01/31. This list covers the projects started within the last 15 days since the previous one. You’ll find there really cool game and more interesting projects. English Crowdfundings 5 Roleplaying Games 2 Cyberpunk Roleplaying Games 2 Fantasy Roleplaying Games 3 Family-Friendly Roleplaying Games 1 Solo Roleplaying Games 1 Larp 3 Settings 2 Sourcebooks 6 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 2 Mörk Borg Sourcebooks 5 System-Specific Sourcebooks 2 Adventures 6 D&D 5E Adventures 7 Dice Projects 2 Dice Towers 3 Accessoires 1 Coin Project 1 Soundscape 4 Deck of Cards 3 Apps 1 Notebook 5 Map Projects 1 Enamel Pin 4 Various RPG Projects Spanish Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game French Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 1 Campaign Setting 1 Actual Play Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/02/01/crowdfunding-collection-189/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #189, including every tabletop rpg project started between 01/16 and 01/31
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #189, including every tabletop rpg project started between 01/16 and 01/31.

This list covers the projects started within the last 15 days since the previous one. You’ll find there really cool game and more interesting projects.

English Crowdfundings

5 Roleplaying Games
2 Cyberpunk Roleplaying Games
2 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
3 Family-Friendly Roleplaying Games
1 Solo Roleplaying Games
1 Larp
3 Settings
2 Sourcebooks
6 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
2 Mörk Borg Sourcebooks
5 System-Specific Sourcebooks
2 Adventures
6 D&D 5E Adventures
7 Dice Projects
2 Dice Towers
3 Accessoires
1 Coin Project
1 Soundscape
4 Deck of Cards
3 Apps
1 Notebook
5 Map Projects
1 Enamel Pin
4 Various RPG Projects

Spanish Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

French Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
1 Campaign Setting
1 Actual Play

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/02/01/crowdfunding-collection-189/
